Reviews.Content: pedi un blackberry 9320 nuevo en febrero y me enviaron uno usado.. quisiera saber si hay una posibilidad de regresarlo y que me envien uno nuevo.. y tambien lo enviaron sin factura al buzon!UNLOCKED RIM Blackberry Curve 9320 GSM Quad-Band Smartphone con cámara de 3.2 MP, Wi-Fi, GPS, radio FM, NUEVO, A GRANEL PACKAGED, 2G GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ, 3G UMTS 2100/1900/850/800MHZ

Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Content: excellent product is in good condition and recommend international rather have good signal and I am located in Venezuela.Thanks for the good transaction

Reviews.Title: Poor service.
Reviews.Author: Ila Benjamin Bunche
Reviews.Content: I like the phone, however, I was very disappointed after receiving the bulk package and having to pay such exorbitant price for the package. Also  to add insult to injury no headphone  Which  I subsequently  received and had to pay additional cost for the package. I am very disappointed

Reviews.Title: Amazing product.
Reviews.Author: edred gioberti gutierrez sierra
Reviews.Content: Amazing product. i don't regret purchasing this phone. I reside in Trinidad and Tobago and there were no problems. The phone came brand new, unlocked and was remarkably fast. I recommend that you purchase this phone. you surely won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9320
Reviews.Author: Leo Becerra
Reviews.Content: It was what I expected, brand new, Great delivery as expected.it came with chargers and manuals.i would definitelyPurchase more at the same price.

Reviews.Author: Orlando Eusebio Ozoria "Orlando Eusebio Ozoria"
Reviews.Content: The team is completely new and this liberated one for any operator of mobile telephony, also lifts 3g in Venezuela for Movistar and Movilnet

Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE, SIN PROBLEMASUNLOCKED RIM Blackberry 9320 Curve GSM Quad-Band Smartphone with 3.2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, FM Radio, NEW, BULK PACKAGED, 2G GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ, 3G UMTS 2100/1900/850/800MHZ

Reviews.Title: Looove it!
Reviews.Author: Chichi Ideli
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone.It came just like as is. and i was able to do it all and more

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: 14love
Reviews.Content: Phone was really good both it dont come with case,phone was perfect was more than what i speck,just that it dont come in box

Reviews.Title: Amo mi nuevo bb9320 / i love my new bb9320
Reviews.Author: rene gonzalez
Reviews.Content: It's new, not refurbished. It met all my expectations, works great in Venezuela with 3g Movistar and Movilnet. I'm very happy with my product, i recommend this seller 100%. It comes without box, so if that's a problem... take that in mind. Overall.. a very good experience with everythingEl equipo es nuevo, funcionó perfecto con la red 3G movistar y la red Movilnet en Venezuela. Llegó en perfecto estado y en el tiempo estimado. Estoy muy contento con esta compra. Recomiendo el vendedor 100%. Si vives en Vzla y quieres comprar un equipo a buen precio y de calidad, no dudes en comprar este equipo. Ten en cuenta que envian el producto sin caja, si eso es un problema para ti, pues toma tus previsiones.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Pilar Monsalve
Reviews.Content: The delivery of the phone was on time, in perfect conditionthe camera is great, the sharpness of the videos is wonderfulGood price, works with 3G and 4G for Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 9320
Reviews.Author: Ms. Alleyne
Reviews.Content: Blackberry curve at present is not holdIng any battery life can you guys assist me? Hoping to hear from someone as soon as possible.Thanks!Sharon

Reviews.Title: graet Phone
Reviews.Author: Arnaldo Tovar
Reviews.Content: I love the phone came without any inconvenience. It was just what I wanted. 3g works with Movistar, very fast connection to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The phone is terrific and works well, the shipping time was excellent and the features are top notch. I might get as a gift for my mom as well.

Reviews.Title: please redirect the sport purchase.
Reviews.Author: LORENA SOUBLETT
Reviews.Content: Please you have all the tools to redirect this purchase, on other occasions I have purchased and the merchandise was sent to that address but mismanos escpa of my broker has moved from LORENA YOLIMAR SOUBLETT RONDON10411 NW 28TH STD2D STE C103-11230DORAL, FLORIDA 33172-2100United Statesthe new address is  LORENA YOLIMAR SOUBLETT RONDON (8357 NW 68TH ST, Miami, FL 33166) D2D-11230 C103 United States.the only one who can Redirect this purchase is you, the barn was rented by another company of which we have no names or contact numbers.Please I apologize for the inconvenience caused, but escapes from my hands.Lorena Soublett.

Reviews.Title: Unmarked and New
Reviews.Author: Shark88
Reviews.Content: I've tested these phones for about a week, and I like them. They are exactly as described by the seller. New and unbranded. I'm hoping I can use them in the Caribbean since the networks are the same type as T-Mobile.  Also, the seller answered two emails promptly, and offered additional assistance if it was needed. I would definitely buy again from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Acorde a mis expectativas
Reviews.Author: Carolina P
Reviews.Content: hasta ahora que el equipo esta acorde a mis expectativas; ha funcionado perfecto desde que lo recibí y he podido cargar sus paquetes sin ningún inconveniente aquí en Venezuela con la linea Movilnet!

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM 2G 850/900/1800/1900 MHz, 3G UMTS 2100/1900/850/800 MHz; BlackBerry OS 7.1
3.2 MP Camera with LED Flash; FM Radio, Video Recording; Wi-Fi; MP3 and MP4 Player; 3.5mm Ear Jack; microSD up to 32 GB; Bluetooth; Optical Trackpad; QWERTY Keypad; SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM and Social Networking.
BlackBerry OS 7.0; GPS with A-GPS support; HTML Browser; Internal Memory 512 MB storage, 512 MB RAM; Speed HSDPA, 7.2 Mbps; HSUPA and Document Viewer.
Big and bright screen display: QVGA 320x240 resolution, 164 ppi, Transmissive TFT LCD, 2.44-Inch (measured diagonally), •512MB built-in storage; expandable to 32GB with microSD card
BULK ITEM, NO RETAIL BOX, MAY BE CARRIER BRANDED BUT IS COMPLETELY UNLOCKED, INCLUDES: Phone, Travel Charger, USB Cable, Rechargeable Battery, Wired Stereo Headset
